info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lea, northwestern Winkler and northeastern Loving Counties through 645 PM CDT/545 PM MDT/... At 545 PM CDT/445 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jal, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jal, Jal Airport and Bennett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
